metadata.title: Fantasie Ottawa Twist Underwire Bandeau Bikini Top
features: The fantasie swimwear collection has a rear plastic clasp rear closure and fully removable and adjustable shoulder straps to enable you to get the best possible fit. The style has lightly padded foam cups for a great fit.
Fantasie swimwear recommends Hand Washing there womens bikini tops for best results.
This Fantasie Bandeau Multiway Bikini top has great shape and styling. The Fantasie Ottawa White halter Bikini has a fun tone and fashionable styling.

The Fantasie Tankini top has smooth seam free Scoop Neck cups and curved underwire to give you great support and comfort. The Fantasie swimwear collection has a wide selection of style available. The long waist tankini styling will give your stomach coverage from your swimwear choice.

The comfortable and supportive cups gives you a rounded shape and a controlled cleavage, without push up. The Fantasie Ottawa White Tankini has fixed over the shoulder straps that are adjustable and will help you get a great fit.
description: Chic and classy convertible bandeau bikini top, Get incredible support with foam lined underwire cups. Concealed power net wings with boning for support, Stretch straps convert to criss-cross, halter, or strapless. Non-adjustable, single snap back closure Brand: Fantasie, Style Number: FS6354. Body: 84% Nylon, 9% Elastane, 7% Polyester.
